data.title: Top 26 Aerospace Parts Manufacturers: A Comprehensive List
data.meta_description: Explore the top 26 aerospace parts manufacturing companies such as Safran and Boeing, offering innovative solutions in aviation and defense systems
data.text:
The aerospace parts manufacturing industry comprises companies engaged in the design, manufacturing, and sales of parts for aircraft and defense systems. These companies offer a wide array of products and solutions ranging from engines, electrical systems, spacecraft, missiles to cutting-edge aircraft. The industry is globally dispersed and known for its technological advancements and innovation. Looking ahead, the industry is leaning towards sustainability and increased efficiency, designing parts which minimize environmental impact and maximize operational performance.

Top 26 Aerospace Parts Manufacturing Companies

1. Safran

Website: safran-group.com

Headquarters: Paris, Washington, France

Founded: 2005

Headcount: 10001+

Latest funding type: Ipo

LinkedIn

Safran Group is a global company that specializes in aerospace and defense technologies. They offer a wide range of products and services in areas such as aircraft engines, electrical systems, landing systems, and more. With a presence in 27 countries, Safran Group is known for its innovation and commitment to sustainability.

2. Lockheed Martin

Website: lockheedmartin.com

Headquarters: Bethesda, Maryland, United States

Founded: 1912

Headcount: 10001+

Latest funding type: Post Ipo Equity

LinkedIn

Lockheed Martin is a global aerospace and defense company that offers a wide range of advanced technology products and services. They specialize in the design, development, manufacturing, and integration of cutting-edge aircraft, missiles, spacecraft, and other defense systems.

3. Boeing

Website: boeing.com

Headquarters: Arlington, Virginia, United States

Founded: 1916

Headcount: 10001+

Latest funding type: Grant

LinkedIn

Boeing is a global aerospace company that offers innovative and technologically advanced products and solutions in the aviation and defense industry. They design, manufacture, and service commercial aircraft, military aircraft, satellites, and missiles.

4. GKN Aerospace

Website: gknaerospace.com

Headquarters: Solihull, West Midlands, United Kingdom

Founded: 1759

Headcount: 10001+

LinkedIn

GKN Aerospace is a technology leader in smart engine systems, serving the world's leading aircraft and aero-engine manufacturers. With three business lines (civil airframe, defense airframe, and engine systems), GKN Aerospace is shaping the Future of Flight.

5. Figeac Aero

Website: figeac-aero.com

Headquarters: Figeac, Midi-PyrÃ©nÃ©es, France

Founded: 1989

Headcount: 1001-5000

Latest funding type: Post Ipo Equity

LinkedIn

Figeac Aero is a company in the aerospace sector that specializes in metal transformation, surface treatment, assembly, quality control, and supply chain management. They offer a range of products and services including engineering, industrialization, speedshop, structural parts, precise engine parts, and subassemblies.

6. SpaceX

Website: spacex.com

Headquarters: Hawthorne, California, United States

Founded: 2002

Headcount: 1001-5000

Latest funding type: Private Equity

LinkedIn

SpaceX is a private aerospace manufacturer and space transportation company. It offers advanced rockets and spacecrafts for various missions.

7. GE Aerospace

Website: geaviation.com

Headquarters: Cincinnati, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1894

Headcount: 10001+

Latest funding type: Grant

LinkedIn

GE Aviation is a leading provider of jet and turboprop engines, as well as integrated systems for commercial, military, business, and general aviation aircraft. They offer through-life support, open architecture solutions, electrification, avionics, electrical power integration, propeller systems, gas turbine components, software solutions, and marine systems.

8. Barnes Aerospace

Website: barnesaero.com

Headquarters: Windsor, Connecticut, United States

Headcount: 1001-5000

LinkedIn

Barnes Aerospace is a leading provider of highly engineered machined and fabricated components and assemblies for aircraft engines and airframe manufacturers, as well as land-based industrial gas turbines. They offer new manufactured parts, spares support, and turbine engine component repairs, setting the industry standard.

9. Magroup

Website: magroup.net

Headquarters: Napoli, Campania, Italy

Founded: 1936

Headcount: 501-1000

Latest funding type: Private Equity

LinkedIn

MAGROUP is a company in the aerospace and defense industry that offers technologies, products, and services for future needs. They develop innovative solutions to anticipate customer demands and specialize in landing gears, actuation systems, aerostuctures, and special processes.

10. Gemsons Precision Engineering Private Limited

Website: gemsons.com

Headquarters: Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

Founded: 1964

Headcount: 501-1000

LinkedIn

Gemsons Precision Engineering Pvt Ltd is a leader in the CNC machined component and assembly business. With over 55 years of engineering business experience, they offer a range of high-quality products developed across multiple industries including Aerospace, Oil & Gas, Power & Energy, Fire & Security, and more. They provide custom-made components and assemblies, using state-of-the-art CNC turning and vertical milling machines. Gemsons ensures excellent quality and competitive pricing, delivering products efficiently and meeting customer requirements.

11. NMG Aerospace

Website: nmgaerospace.com

Headquarters: Stow, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1967

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

NMG Aerospace is a trusted provider of aerospace components, offering unparalleled design expertise and manufacturing capabilities. With over 50 years of experience, they deliver parts that meet the rigorous standards of defense and aerospace companies.

12. Ferco Aerospace

Website: fercoaerospacegroup.com

Headquarters: Franklin, Ohio, United States

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

Ferco Aerospace Group is a leading producer of brackets and exotic metal fabrications for aerospace and industrial gas turbine engines. With over 60 years of experience, they specialize in supplying fabrications utilizing titanium, high nickel alloys, aluminum, and stainless steel.

13. Deharde GmbH

Website: deharde.de

Headquarters: Varel, Niedersachsten, Germany

Founded: 1909

Headcount: 201-500

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Deharde is a company specializing in wind tunnel model construction and precision parts for the aerospace industry. Their innovative production method, Deharde Polygon Forming, reduces lead time and production costs while maintaining high quality. They manufacture curved, twisted, and conical metal shells without the need for post-processing. Their expertise in Precision Parts, Systems and Fixtures, and Wind Tunnel Model Construction allows them to provide comprehensive services from concept to commissioning. Deharde is known for its efficiency and ability to deliver tailored solutions to complex requirements.

14. Corrtech Energy Limited

Website: corrtechenergy.com

Headquarters: Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India

Founded: 2000

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

Corrtech Energy is a company that offers innovative products in the field of precision aerospace/defense components, gas and steam turbine components, and supply of spares, replacement parts, and component repairs. They provide rapid turnaround times and have expertise in manufacturing and field services.

15. Enjet Aero

Website: enjetaero.com

Headquarters: Overland Park, Kansas, United States

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

Enjet Aero is a company specializing in the manufacturing of precision machined and fabricated components and assemblies for jet engines. They serve the commercial, defense, and general aviation industries with their broad capabilities and are dedicated to exceeding customer expectations.

16. JEP Precision Engineering

Website: jepprecision.com.sg

Headquarters: Singapore, Central Region, Singapore

Founded: 1990

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

JEP Precision Engineering Pte Ltd, a subsidiary of JEP Holdings Ltd, is a leading provider of high quality precision-machined products for the aerospace, oil & gas, electronics, and machine tool industries. Established in 1990, JEP offers reliable and efficient services as a trusted subcontractor to the aerospace and oil & gas sectors in the region.

17. XCEL Aerospace

Website: xcelaerospace.com

Headquarters: Romford, Essex, United Kingdom

Founded: 1979

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Xcel Aerospace is a company that specializes in aerospace manufacturing and engineering. They offer a wide range of products and services including aircraft parts, components, and maintenance solutions.

18. Ford Aerospace Ltd

Website: ford-engineering.com

Headquarters: South Shields, Tyne And Wear, United Kingdom

Founded: 1910

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Ford Engineering Group is a global specialist in high precision machining and pressing of parts and sub-assemblies for the aerospace, industrial, and high-technology sectors.

19. BAZ Airborne Components & Assemblies

Website: bazaircraft.com

Headquarters: Mp, Misgav, Israel

Founded: 1977

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

BAZ Airborne Components & Assemblies is a company specializing in aerospace manufacturing. They offer a complete solution for manufacturing and assembling airplane parts and components. With a focus on quality and certifications, BAZ delivers high-quality products to the aerospace industry.

20. Middlesex Aerospace

Website: middlesexaerospace.com

Headquarters: Basingstoke, Hampshire, United Kingdom

Founded: 2016

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Middlesex Aerospace is a strategic market leading British aerospace manufacturer and global aerospace engineering company. They provide complex machined components and fully tested assemblies for both the fixed wing and rotary wing market. Their expertise includes class 1 safety critical parts and assemblies used in undercarriage, transmission, and hub assemblies.

21. Omni Aerospace

Website: omniks.com

Headquarters: Wichita, Kansas, United States

Founded: 1994

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Omni Aerospace is a leading aerospace manufacturer and aircraft parts supplier. They specialize in custom engineering, aircraft part manufacturing, and electrical assembly. With a focus on innovation, on-time delivery, and quality, they offer tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of their customers.

22. Auto-Valve, Inc.

Website: autovalve.com

Headquarters: Dayton, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1948

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Auto-Valve, Inc. is a manufacturing company specializing in precision machining for aerospace design and manufacturing. They provide high-quality complex parts with exceptional accuracy, cutting materials to exact specifications. With a skilled team and state-of-the-art technology, Auto-Valve is committed to excellence in the industry.

23. JCS Vanetec

Website: jcs-vanetec.com.sg

Headquarters: Singapore, North Region, Singapore

Founded: 2004

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

JCS-Vanetec Pte Ltd is a specialist in manufacturing components for leading aviation, land and marine engine original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) with core competency in engine high pressure compressor airfoils and turn-key solutions for inspection and production toolings.

24. Aeropac

Website: aeropac.com.ar

Headquarters: Las Heras, Mendoza, Argentina

Founded: 1986

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Aeropac S.A. is an aerospace company that specializes in the design, manufacturing, and supply of high-tech components for the aeronautical and spatial industries. With a focus on strict regulations and quality assurance, Aeropac offers services in machining, milling, and manufacturing of aerospace parts, as well as the design and construction of components for missile structures. They cater to various industries such as nuclear, automotive, food, railroad, oil, metallurgical, and naval.

25. Walker AEC (Poole) Ltd

Website: walkeraec.com

Headquarters: Poole, Dorset, United Kingdom

Founded: 1974

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Walker AEC is a leading supplier of Landing Gear, Hydraulic, and Actuation components and assemblies to the aerospace industry. They specialize in manufacturing and assembling complex components to exacting standards. With their comprehensive machining facility, they can produce a wide range of component parts, from small ones to large ones. Additionally, they manage a strong supply chain to support their material and bought-out needs, ensuring high-quality products for their customers.

26. Stanek Tool, LLC

Website: stanektool.com

Headquarters: New Berlin, Wisconsin, United States

Founded: 1924

Headcount: 11-50

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Stanek Tool is a precision machine shop specializing in aerospace machining and assembly. They offer a broad range of capabilities including custom machining, prototype manufacturing, small-to-medium production runs, and engineering support.

Want to find more aerospace parts manufacturing companies?

If you want to find more companies that specialize in aircraft engines, defense systems you can do so with Inven. This list was built with Inven and there are hundreds of companies like these globally.

With Inven you'll also get to know the company's:

Ownership: Which of these are private equity backed? Which are family-owned?

Contact data: Who are the owners and CEO's? What are their emails and phone numbers?

Financials: How do these companies perform financially? What are their revenues and profit margins?

...and a lot more!
